Instruction: Drain and rinse black beans. Mash them with a fork.
Peel and grate the sweet potato. Squeeze out excess moisture.
Combine black beans, sweet potato, onion, garlic, breadcrumbs, oatmeal, cumin, chili powder, salt, and pepper in a large bowl. Mix well.
Wash and scrub sweet potatoes for fries. Cut into even-sized fries.
Toss fries with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Spread fries on a baking sheet and roast for 20-25 minutes, or until crispy.
Cook veggie burgers in a skillet with a little olive oil over medium heat for 5-7 minutes per side, or until cooked through.
Slice avocado and serve with veggie burgers and sweet potato fries.
